entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
